also seen in alcoholics who have a constant habit of drinking alcohol and so the B complex dips because a bacterial flora is destroyed so absorption of nutrients reduce so when B
complex dips peripheral neuropathy happens and the other reason can be endurance whenever there is an injury of the nerves which supplies the peripheral areas then there can be peripheral

when the weather is really bad very cold weathers frostbite can cause peripheral neuropathy we also based on the area affected we can use the right homeopathic medicine which can cure
